item.title: Basics of UFW - uncomplicated firewall
item.description: Configuring ufw for different rules is not difficult at all. However, I will provide couple of commands which are useful for the home server. Enabling ufw: sudo ufw enable Disabling ufw: sudo ufw disable Listing available apps: sudo ufw app list Allowing ssh: sudo ufw allow OpenSSH or sudo ufw allow ssh Allow Syncthing gui, but only to local network: sudo ufw allow from 192.168.0.0/24 to any app syncthing-gui - for the ipv4 connection from address 192.
